enhanced_by.reason: The addOptionGroup method internally calls addOption for each option in the group, indicating a strong state dependency.
The addOptionGroup method modifies the required state of options within the group, which should be tested for consistency.
The getOptionGroup method can be used to verify that the added option group is correctly associated with its options.
The getRequiredOptions method can be used to verify that the required options are correctly updated after adding an option group.
